chapter.pericope: God Commands Hosea to Start a Family
chapter.p: 1The word of Yahweh that came to Hosea son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, the kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.

ul.li1: 2At the beginning when Yahweh spokeLiterally “At the beginning of the talking of Yahweh” through Hosea,
ul.li2: “Go, take for yourself a wife and children of whoredom,
because the land commits great whoredom
ul.li1: 3So he went and took Gomer daughter of Diblaim,
ul.li2: and she conceived and bore him a son.
ul.li1: “Name himLiterally “Call his name” Jezreel;Jezreel means “God sows”
ul.li2: because in a little while I will punishLiterally “I will visit sin upon” the house of JehuOr “the dynasty of Jehu”
for the bloodOr “bloodshed” of Jezreel,Jezreel means “God sows”
ul.li3: and I will put an end to the kingdom of the house of Israel.Or “the dynasty of Israel”
ul.li1: 5On that dayLiterally “And it will happen on that day”
ul.li2: I will break the bow of Israel

chapter.p: 6And she conceived again and bore a daughter, and heYahweh said to him,

ul.li1: “Name herLiterally “Call her name” Lo-ruhamah,Lo-ruhamah means “Not pitied”
for I will no longer have pity
7But I will have pity on the house of Judah
ul.li2: and I will save them by Yahweh their God,
ul.li1: 8And when she had weaned Lo-ruhamah,Lo-ruhamah means “Not pitied” she conceived and bore a son.
9And heYahweh said, “Name himLiterally “Call his name” Lo-ammi,Lo-ammi means “not my people”
ul.li2: for you are not my people
and I am not your God.Hebrew “not yours”
ul.li1: 10Hosea 1:10–2:23 in the English Bible is 2:1–25 in the Hebrew Bible The number of the children of Israel
ul.li2: will be like the sand of the sea
that cannot be measured or counted;
ul.li1: and in the place where it is said to them,
it will be said to them,
ul.li2: and Israel will be gathered together,
ul.li1: and they will appoint for themselves
and they will take possession ofLiterally “they will go up from” the land,
ul.li2: for great is the day of Jezreel.Jezreel means “God sows”
